EmailTemplate.name: 181219 - Gratitude Campaign Client Update
EmailTemplate.subject: Quotes from your Livongo members...
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
This Thanksgiving, we wanted to thank our members and encourage them to take a step back to realize there are many things to be grateful for in their diabetes journey.
Members were given the opportunity to win an electronic kitchen scale for Thanksgiving to help reach their health goals by sharing a story of gratitude.
Here are quotes from a handful of your members:
[paste quotes]
Stay healthy,
[Rep Signature]
